DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to develop and validate a questionnaire to screen and assess adult primary care patients for tobacco, alcohol, prescription drug, and drug use and problems related to their use.
DOC.brief_title: The Tobacco, Alcohol, Prescription Medication and Other Substances Tool
DOC.criteria: Primary care patients Able to provide informed consent inability to comprehend spoken English inability to selfadminister the instrument on the tablet computer due to physical limitations previously enrolled in the study
